info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 4:04AM EST until January 07 at 10:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 4 inches. * WHERE...In Indiana, St. Joseph and Elkhart Counties. In Michigan, St. Joseph County. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 10 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will mainly impact the Friday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...West winds 10 to 20 mph may cause some blowing and drifting. Wind chill values will be around zero.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
